##Load data

```{r}

pdOriginal <- read.csv("~/final-project/data/pd_main.csv")
```

Rename column names:
```{r}



pdRename <- pdOriginal %>% rename_at(vars(oldnames), ~ newnames)

pdRename <- rename(pdOriginal, "0" = "X0.15.min.", "1" = "X16.30.min.", "2" = "X31.45.min.", "3")

```
